title: One-quarter of Canadians 'barely keeping heads above water': Poll - Toronto Sun
description: One-quarter of Canadians 'barely keeping heads above water': Poll Toronto Sun More Canadians afraid of becoming sick with COVID-19: poll Global News Edmontonians build hope by helping others during the COVID-19 pandemic Edmonton Journal Canadians growing more…
content: The economic hardships imposed by COVID have put of Canadians in a position where they can barely keep their heads above water according to a poll The Angus Reid poll released Monday found of respondents say they re in good shape but worried chars
